example.name: beam-grace
example.description: Demonstration of how to encode multiple levels of tuplets. This example simulates a written out ornament played as a quintuplet 32nd notes within a triplet-eighth note pattern.

file.name: nested.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: nested.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
